TypeSignature.Value: public delegate uint NominalGlyphsDelegate(Font font, object fontData, uint count, ReadOnlySpan<uint> codepoints, Span<uint> glyphs);
.class public auto ansi sealed NominalGlyphsDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The user-specified font data associated with the font.
The number of code points to map.
A read-only span of Unicode code points to map to glyphs.
A span to receive the resulting glyph identifiers.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to map multiple Unicode code points to their nominal glyph identifiers in a single batch operation.
Docs.returns: The number of code points successfully mapped to glyphs.
